price: 14. Nee! Maar op hun harten is de bedekking van de zonden en kwade daden, die zij verdienden!
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
